Question
========

x is the mean and Y is the standard deviation of a set of measurements that is normally distributed. What then is the percentage within x +- 2Y of these measurements?

Answerlist
----------

* 34%
* 68%
* 95%
* 99%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 34%: Incorrect
* 68%: Incorrect
* 95%: Correct
* 99%: Incorrect
